attributes.action: stop Taxi metres charging customers when the vehicle is not moving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These days it has become something of a nightmare trying to get a taxi from one place to another, particularly in busier cities in the UK, as congestion on the roads is increasingly common. Whenever one makes a taxi journey, one has to hope and pray that there's no delay in ones journey, as the amount on the metre will continue to increase even at a standstill at lights or in traffic jams. I don't feel it necessary to charge one for excerpts of ones journey when the vehicle is not moving.
